## Plots and Analysis


Average Flux of Each Site
```{r , eval=TRUE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE, fig.width = 12}
col1avg <- mean(col1$Flux_eos1)
col2avg <- mean(col2$Flux_eos1)
col3avg <- mean(col3$Flux_eos1)
col4avg <- mean(col4$Flux_eos1)
col5avg <- mean(col5$Flux_eos2)
col6avg <- mean(col6$Flux_eos2)
col7avg <- mean(col7$Flux_eos2)
col8avg <- mean(col8$Flux_eos2)

col1sd <- sd(col1$Flux_eos1)
col2sd <- sd(col2$Flux_eos1)
col3sd <- sd(col3$Flux_eos1)
col4sd <- sd(col4$Flux_eos1)
col5sd <- sd(col5$Flux_eos2)
col6sd <- sd(col6$Flux_eos2)
col7sd <- sd(col7$Flux_eos2)
col8sd <- sd(col8$Flux_eos2)

a <- data.frame(AverageFlux = c(col1avg,col2avg,col3avg,col4avg,col5avg,col6avg,col7avg, col8avg))
rownames(a) <- c("col1", "col2", "col3", "col4", "col5", "col6", "col7", "col8")
kable(a, format = "markdown", row.names = TRUE)

sd <- data.frame(StdDev=
c(col1sd,col2sd,col3sd,col4sd,col5sd,col6sd,col7sd, col8sd))
rownames(sd) <- c("col1", "col2", "col3", "col4", "col5", "col6", "col7", "col8")
kable(sd, format = "markdown", row.names = TRUE)

a <- cbind(a,sd)

 
avgplot <- ggplot(a)+
 geom_errorbar(aes(x= 1:8,ymin= AverageFlux - StdDev, ymax= AverageFlux + StdDev), width=0.2, size=1, color="blue") +
  geom_point(aes(x= 1:8, y= AverageFlux), color = "blue", size = 5)

avgplot <- avgplot + scale_x_continuous(breaks=1:8, labels=c("col1", "col2", "col3", "col4", "col5", "col6", "col7", "col8")) +
labs(x = "Collar", y = "Average FLux")
        

avgplot

```
